Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Na prodaju je atraktivno ekološko imanje i OPG koji je u upisniku ekoloških subjekata od 2011. godine. Imanje se sastoji od cca. 10.000m2 ograđene okućnice na kojoj se nalaze kuća, novo obnovljeni gospodarski objekt, gospodarski objekt za renovaciju, dvije garaže i kuruzana. Oko kuće je stari, većinom crnogorični arboretum površine 3000 m2, a na ostatku okućnice je voćnjak s brojnim voćnim vrstama, te povrtnjak. Uz kuću se nalaze bunar  (opcionalno spojen na kućni hidrofor) i gusterna. Kuća je tlocrtne kvadrature 90m2 orijentacije prema jugu i sastoji se od podruma /suterena stambene visine s 5 prostorija ( gdje se nalaze: plinski bojler za centralno grijanje, električni bojler za toplu vodu, hidrofor, wc, ledenica, hladnjak) Na katu je montažna Marlesova kuća u potpunosti namještena i u funkciji,  koja se sastoji od prostranog dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, predsoblja, toileta, tri spavaće sobe i kupaonice. Zahvaljujući velikim prozorima i staklenim vratima (Jelovica) kuća je veoma svijetla i izvrsno izolirana. Kuća je spojena na gradski vodovod, gradski plin i na parceli je priključak za kanalizaciju. OPG-u vlasnički pripada i hektar poljoprivrednog (ali i građevinskog) zemljišta u istoj ulici 100 metara udaljeno od kuće. Objekt (peradarnik) površine 140 m2 je kompletno renoviran 2021. godine. Imanje se nalazi gotovo u centru Lipovljana, desetak minuta hoda od škole, vrtića, ambulante, raznih trgovina i crkvi, a opet je izolirano visokim živicama i drvećem. Obzirom na površinu iskoristivog zemljišta i objekata na parceli imanje je gotovo u potpunosti samodostatno. http://www.organska-proizvodnja-jaja.com.hr/ Za sve dodatne informacije molim da nam se obratite na: +385 91 618 6417 +385 1 2304 188 RE/MAX Commercial Hondlova 2/9 Zagreb Sve informacije dane od agenta smatraju se važećim, no moraju se zasebno procijeniti. ________________________________________________________________ For sale is an attractive ecological property and OPG, which has been in the register of ecological entities since 2011. The property consists of approx. 10,000 m2 of fenced yard with a house, a newly renovated outbuilding, outbuilding for renovation, two garages and a shed. Around the house is an old, mostly conifer arboretum with an area of ​​3000 m2, and on the rest of the garden there is an orchard with numerous fruit species and a vegetable garden. Next to the house there is a well (optionally connected to the house hydrophore) and a water well. The house has a floor plan of 90m2, oriented to the south and consists of a basement/basement of living height with 5 rooms (where are located: gas boiler for central heating, electric boiler for hot water, hydrophore, toilet, freezer, refrigerator) On the first floor, Marles' prefabricated house is fully furnished and functional, consisting of a spacious living room, kitchen, hallway, toilet, three bedrooms and a bathroom. Thanks to the large windows and glass doors (Jelovica), the house is very bright and excellently insulated. The house is connected to the city water supply, city gas and there is a sewage connection on the plot. OPG also owns a hectare of agricultural (as well as construction) land in the same street 100 meters away from the house. The building (poultry house) with an area of ​​140 m2 was completely renovated in 2021. The property is located almost in the center of Lipovljan, a ten-minute walk from the school, kindergarten, clinic, various shops and the church, yet it is isolated by tall hedges and trees. Considering the area of ​​usable land and buildings on the plot, the estate is almost completely self-sufficient.
